Oct 27 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - FY 2022 H1 TRADING UPDATE *AVEVA - REVENUE GREW BY APPROXIMATELY 9% IN FIRST HALF OF FINANCIAL YEAR ON A PRO FORMA ORGANIC CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS *AVEVA - HY MAINTENANCE AND SERVICES REVENUE INCREASED AT A LOW SINGLE DIGIT RATE


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-OCT-202106:00:02 GMT
